title: Suzie keeps screaming at brother after mother yell

content.prompt: Suzie screamed at her little brother, and her mother yelled, “We do not yell in this house!” Suzie continues to yell at her brother despite her mother reprimanding her. Suzie’s behavior is best explained by

topic.text: 3.9: Social, Cognitive, and Neurological Factors in Learning

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
